entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:29 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022
